analysis.description:
Reentrancy in ABCPresale.closePresale (/unique_contracts/0x118827c3da7abef62c3899531fcf75478dad5a4a.sol#409-419):
	External calls:
	- finalization() (/unique_contracts/0x118827c3da7abef62c3899531fcf75478dad5a4a.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_contracts/0x118827c3da7abef62c3899531fcf75478dad5a4a.sol)

Reentrancy in ABCPresale.finalize (/unique_contracts/0x118827c3da7abef62c3899531fcf75478dad5a4a.sol):
	External calls:
	- finalization() (/unique_contracts/0x118827c3da7abef62c3899531fcf75478dad5a4a.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_contracts/0x118827c3da7abef62c3899531fcf75478dad5a4a.sol)

ABCPresale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x118827c3da7abef62c3899531fcf75478dad5a4a.sol#366-378) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x118827c3da7abef62c3899531fcf75478dad5a4a.sol#375-376)

ABCPresale.finalization (/unique_contracts/0x118827c3da7abef62c3899531fcf75478dad5a4a.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(developer,developer_abc.mul(2000)) (/unique_contracts/0x118827c3da7abef62c3899531fcf75478dad5a4a.sol)
	-token.mint(founders,founders_abc.mul(2000)) (/unique_contracts/0x118827c3da7abef62c3899531fcf75478dad5a4a.sol)
